driving

its a pain during the day to drive, but come night time its nice, did you know weed is better than skunk.

ninja muslim women

i saw that ninja women today, you know the one that was on the tv news, it was about the fact this country wont alow her to wear the vail and teach children, well i saw her today and i said hiya, she riplied i dont know you, i said i know i saw you on the news though, she said that was not me, i said yes it was she said no it was'nt i said ok then lets ask someone else so we did and they also saw her on the news lol "THE STORRY GOES ON" <<< she said ok then which one am i now i said that one >>> she said nope im this one

muslim womens veil's

i walked past a muslim woman with a veil on today and i put my thumbs up at her with a smile and jested to her, "core that is a good idea covering your mouth up with that veil, is this so as we don't smell your bad breath lol," she replied "its not for that reason silly," i said, "then why are you covering your breath," she replied, "cos i dont want another man cos i'm married," i said, "i still fancy you," she said, "how come?" i said, "cos i know your a woman you dummy, " she said, "i'm a ,man really and that i am ready to do a bank robbery," so with that i said, "right you are not gonna do this" and i grabbed the man and started fighting with him, the veil came off and i WAS right from the begining and i said to her, "see! i was right, you are a woman," she replied with a huffff and a puff, sort of like blowing at me, WELLL !, the breath hit me, i was gassed down and left there to die with the poowy stench. ............... """""""" i thinks to my self emmm , it would be more sensible to brush your teeth and listerine them .""""""""

Lets beat racism, the i_is stylie ways lol

Why should we all be too careful in what we say, after all the first thing that pops up into our heads enters there instantly without alot of effort in thinking about it, must we then sive out things that we may of been told not to say, thus suppressing peoples true first thoughts, I my self think we are all becoming boring and worried about what you might say may offend, relax and say the first thing that enters your mind WITHIN reason lol.

If someone calls me ugly, or a green faced gonk or anything made to try and ofend me, ill say "issit lol so what," and so long as you are not touched or hit as in assaulted, then why be hurt for words, if someone hits you then you have the right to hit back, the same principle should apply for words put to you, rather give a word back just as you would if you was asulted, if I was black and someone called me a name like you pakiman, ill say yes that’s where I come from Pakistan with a smile though, if someone calls me a yellow man I say so what your a white man and/or black or brown, why cant we call each other names and make fun rather than bring in this thing called racist its bollox, it just makes peoples lives boring and having to be careful what you say ffs, seems people have taken the use of fun and turned it into a tool for gaining some type of help and all cos they cant find a word to give back, I think the only help should be to enlighten the persons whom took it as a tool and rather teach them how to understand the humour in us all and when I say us I mean us people in all countries of the globe.

If you saw a blue person whom had three heads, would you look and stare at him/her and probably make a comment in your own head i think yes we all would, some funny thoughts, some horrid and some loving maybe, out of 10 million people how many comments would be made differently from each different race untold i bet.

Keep your comments to your self, WoW now that would be fun wouldn’t it.

Sorry for having a brain that can think in many ways and not just one track and sorry for having ears that can hear the remarks made, and sorry for seeing a blue three headed person, and finally sorry for being alive to make this remark.

Drove all night

I drove all Niiiiiiiii'GhT, too get to YoOoUu'ooo ooo, is that allright

Banana

i walked into a fruit shop today and I picked up a banana and went to the till to pay, whilst i was paying for it, the till person said, "here mate, do you know how to make banana shakes, cos my daughter wanted to know," i said yeah, so i started shaking the banana in front of him, he said what you doing, i said, you wanted a banana shake did'nt you.

Tony Blair

Tony Blair's coment he made today 8th of December on the tv news, i think it was the right message to people coming over to england and setting home here, that they should not come if they dont like a our rules. cool statement i say

As i see it, if i wonted to live in for argument sakes china, ill move there cos i like there ways of living lol and not have the audacity to even become a burden to the country i chose to live in, afterall i would have gone there cos it was better than the country i was living in at that moment in time.

intercouse

had my first meeting with a female saturday just gone 9th and we had intercouse with condom, it was rude and nice , please try not to get jealous lol, theres enough of me to go round, but condom must be used, please keep in order and que to the left side and ill speak to you when your turn comes, Many Thanks.

Please be patient i will see to you.

Broke down

i broke down about 4 hours ago, it all ov a suddun stopped, no engine noise and the car would not turn over when i tried the key egnition, i thought o no its one of them day ones ffs its really wiered cos when i broke down i broke down right on the same road as my cusin, i had to push the car back about 300 yourds on my own ffs, anyways when i got to his house he said aint you with the "AA" i said "O" 'yeah and lol got on da phone and they rescued me

It was the battery, it needs a new one
